website.name: Summit Roofing Solutions
website.description: Professional roofing contractor specializing in residential and commercial roofing services including installation, repair, and maintenance

theme.name: Professional Contractor
theme.aesthetic: Clean, trustworthy, and professional with strong industrial elements
theme.targetAudience: Homeowners and commercial property managers seeking quality roofing services
theme.designPrinciples: Build trust through clear communication, showcase expertise, emphasize reliability and quality craftsmanship
theme.gradientStyle: Subtle gradients that convey strength and reliability

pages.name: Home
pages.layout: Hero section with service overview, about preview, services grid, testimonials, and contact CTA

sections.name: Hero Section
sections.content: Professional roofing services you can trust. 25+ years of experience protecting homes and businesses with quality craftsmanship and reliable service.

sections.name: Services Overview
sections.content: Complete roofing solutions including residential roofing, commercial roofing, roof repairs, gutter installation, and emergency services

sections.name: Why Choose Us
sections.content: Licensed & insured, 25+ years experience, quality materials, lifetime warranty, emergency services, free estimates

sections.name: Customer Testimonials
sections.content: Reviews and testimonials from satisfied customers showcasing quality work and professional service

sections.name: Contact CTA
sections.content: Ready to protect your property? Contact us today for a free consultation and estimate

pages.name: Services
pages.layout: Service categories with detailed descriptions, process overview, and pricing information

sections.name: Services Hero
sections.content: Comprehensive roofing services for residential and commercial properties

sections.name: Residential Services
sections.content: New roof installation, roof replacement, roof repairs, shingle replacement, tile roofing, metal roofing

sections.name: Commercial Services
sections.content: Commercial roof installation, flat roof repair, TPO roofing, EPDM roofing, roof maintenance programs

sections.name: Emergency Services
sections.content: 24/7 emergency roof repair, storm damage assessment, leak repair, temporary roof protection

pages.name: About
pages.layout: Company story, team, certifications, service area, and company values

sections.name: About Hero
sections.content: 25+ years of roofing excellence serving the community with integrity and craftsmanship

sections.name: Company Story
sections.content: Founded in 1998, Summit Roofing Solutions has been protecting homes and businesses with quality roofing services. Family-owned and operated, we take pride in our craftsmanship and customer service.

sections.name: Team Section
sections.content: Meet our experienced team of roofing professionals, including licensed contractors, project managers, and customer service specialists

sections.name: Certifications
sections.content: Fully licensed and insured, GAF Master Elite certified, OSHA certified, Better Business Bureau A+ rating

pages.name: Portfolio
pages.layout: Before/after photos, project galleries organized by service type, and case studies

sections.name: Portfolio Hero
sections.content: See our quality craftsmanship in action with recent roofing projects

sections.name: Residential Projects
sections.content: Before and after photos of residential roofing projects including new installations, repairs, and replacements

sections.name: Commercial Projects
sections.content: Commercial roofing installations and repairs showcasing our expertise with large-scale projects

pages.name: Contact
pages.layout: Contact form, business information, service area map, and emergency contact details

sections.name: Contact Hero
sections.content: Get your free roofing estimate today. Contact our experts for all your roofing needs

sections.name: Contact Form
sections.content: Request a free estimate with fields for contact info, service type, project details, and preferred contact method

sections.name: Business Info
sections.content: Phone: (555) ROOF-PRO, Email: info@summitroofing.com, Address: 123 Main St, Your City, ST 12345, Hours: Mon-Fri 7AM-6PM, Sat 8AM-4PM

sections.name: Emergency Contact
sections.content: 24/7 Emergency Service Available - Call (555) EMERGENCY for urgent roofing repairs and storm damage

layouts.layoutStyle: Clean, professional layout with strong navigation, prominent CTAs, and trust-building elements
layouts.navigationStyle: Fixed header with clear service menu, contact button, and mobile-responsive hamburger menu
layouts.extra: Include testimonials throughout, before/after photo galleries, service area information, and emergency contact banner

templateInfo.description: Professional roofing contractor website with complete service information, portfolio showcase, and lead generation focus
